outputs.output_descr: The progrm will strengthen the overall governance and public expenditure management systems at the State/local  level in order to enhnace  the State Governments’ capacity for resource planning and public service deliver

project_descr: Strengthen capacities for local governance and strategic planning to entrench decentralization and actualize devolution in Eastern Sudan
project_title: Local Governance Develop. & Public Expenditure Mangement
